entry.title: Increase Number Of Results Per Google Search Page

link.title: Increase Number Of Results Per Google Search Page

entry.summary: When you search for anything on Google, the returned results page will show a total of 10 results per page by default. If you want to see more results, you have to click the switch pages buttons. Google, on the other hand, has a setting that allows you to increase the number of results displayed per search page. Itâ€™s not difficult to do. Following this guide, you can Increase Number Of Results Each Google Search Page

entry.title: How To Use Dark Mode Google Colab

link.title: How To Use Dark Mode Google Colab

entry.summary: Google Colab notebooks allow you to combine executable code and rich text in a single document, along with images, HTML, LaTeX and more. Using dark mode, you can work with computer for longer time because it less damage your eye more than light mode. And in this tutorial, I will show you how to turn on dark mode in Google Colab.
